page.title: 19A Parish Minister's Day
page.content: I do not have any{typical working day! They are all different and unpredictable. People take ill and the undertaker telephones me to tell me about a funeral and my planned schedule is disrupted. However, some things do recur regularly. There is a good deal of business to be done for the Congregational Board and the Kirk Session.I also have to keep in touch with{Presbytery and National Church business.I try to do paperwork in the mornings,and that includes preparation of services.I have 30 t0 40 functions to attend to per month, services, including weddings and funerals, committee meetings and many church organisations. In between that work I visit my parishioners and the local hospitals and caring Homes.This does not leave much time for{family}or hobbies. {by Rev.Irene B.Miller.
